_prev_prog_3.Description: THE BOAR'S HEAD HOLLAND MICHIGAN FACILITY IS EQUIPPED TO RESPOND TO ANY ACCIDENTAL SPILLS OR RELEASES WITH A FULLY EQUIPPED AND TRAINED HAZMAT TEAM, THE TEAM MEMBERS HAVE ALL COMPLETED 40 HOURS OF TRAINING AND 8 HOURS OF REFRESHER TRAINING YEARLY, WE COORDINATE THESE RESPONSES WITH THE HOLLAND FIRE DEPARTMENT, AND CONDUCT REGULAR DRILLS FOR THE EMERGENCY RESPONSES. THE FACILITY IS EQUIPPED WITH AMMONIA DETECTORS IN CRITICAL AREAS OF THE PLANT THAT IN THE EVENT OF AN AMMONIA LEAK WILL SOUND ALARMS AND AUTOMATICALLY START EXHAUST FANS. THE COMPRESSORROOM IS EQUIPPED WITH AN AMMONIA ABSORBTION TANK THAT IN THE EVENT OF A SAFETY VALVE RELEASE OR FAILURE THE AMMONIA WILL NOT REACH ANY OFF SITE RECEPTORS AND BE CONTAINED WITHIN THE WATER TANK. THE OTTAWA COUNTY EMERGENCY SERVICES DEPARTMENT IS COODINATED WITH THE SAFETY DEPARTMENT AND IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY SITUATION, THEY WILL IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE HOLLAND FIRE AND POLICE DEPARTMENTS, ALERT THE SURROUNDING COMMUNITY AS TO THE EXTENT OF THE RELEASE. BOAR'S HEAD HAS GONE TO EXTENSIVE LEGNTHS TO PUT IN PLACE EXTRA SAFEGUARDS IN ORDER TO PROTECT THE SURROUNDING COMMUNITY FROM ANY OFFSITE RELEASES. THE IMMEADIATE GOAL IN A SPECIFIC INCIDENT IS ASSURING THE SAFETY AND HEALTH OF BOAR'S HEAD EMPLOYEES AND RENDERING AID TO THOSE IN NEED. IT IS ALSO THE GOAL OF THE BOAR'S HEAD HAZMAT TEAM TO CONTROL THE SITUATION AND CLEAN UP THE CONTAMINATED AREA BEFORE IT HARMS THE ENVIRONMENT OR THE SURROUNDING COMMINUNITY. IT IS THE PHILOSOPHY OF THE BOAR'S HEAD MANAGEMENT TEAM THAT WE WILL ONLY PRODUCE OUR PRODUCTS IF WE CAN DO IT SAFELY AND WITHOUT HARMING THE ENVIRONMENT.

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
BOAR'S HEAD MAINTAINS THAT WE WILL UTILIZE THE BEST INSTALLATION STANDARDS AVAILABLE TO THE AMMONIA REFRIGERATION INDUSTRY, WE ARE MEMBERS OR THE IIAR AND STAY UP TO DATE ON THE LATEST TECHONOLOGY THAT IS USED IN OUR PROCESS (see attached ammonia refrigeration guidlines for details)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The plant has recently opened and we expect to be in full production within 1 year, the installation of the ammonia refrigeration system was the most advanced in the realm of techonology that has been installed in recent history.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Boar's Head management team recognizes that the safety and safety training of our associates are paramount to an environment of productivity and well being of the associates in our facilities as well as the surrounding community, we have on staff a full time safety coordinator and a health care associate on all production shifts. We routinely train all of the staff on process safety as well as lockout tagout hazcom and food safety. We have located ammonia detectors in all areas where there is a risk for an ammonia leak, we have engineered in controls and a water absorbtion system in the event of a multiple system failure, will contain any ammonia that would be discharged through the relief valve vent lines. The training that we utilize for the operators of our ammonia refrigeration system consists of hands on, books and computer assisted training. We continuously monitor and audit our PSM system in order to prevent mechanical or operational failures of our system.
